taskDescription: Cyclopentanecarboxylic acid and 4-hydroxycyclohexanone have the same formula (C6H10O2), and both contain an –OH and a C═O group. How could you distinguish between them using IR spectroscopy?
detailedSolution: A carboxylic acid has a very broad  − OH absorption at 2500–3300 cm−1.
